page.title: 11Employment
page.content: We interviewed 100 adults, 50 male and 50 females regarding their employment. Results were as follows. {MALE FEMALE } 23 employed 15 employed 23 unemployed 5 unemployed 4 retired 28 housewives 2 retired People interviewed were in a variety of employment and on the whole they could be classed as semi skilled or unskilled. Males were employed as builders, bus drivers, lorry drivers, mechanics and miners, while females were employed as cleaners, hairdressers, secretaries and shop assistants . Most of these women were part-time workers. Unemployment in our survey was 28%, just about average for the district. Male unemployment was 46% while female unemployment figure were 10%.
